entry.edited: Starting today, I'm going to live in this town!

entry.edited: Hi there!��Someday when I grow up, I wanna be a snowman just like my pop!

entry.original: My body might be cold, but my heart is warm.
entry.edited: My body might be cold, but my heart is warm.

entry.original: Do you think I've grown any since yesterday?��After all, kids grow up quick, right?
entry.edited: Do you think I've grown any since yesterday?��After all, kids grow up quick, right?

entry.original: Someday I want to be able to pluck fruit off a tree.��I bet it'd taste yummy if I froze it and turned it into sherbet.
entry.edited: Someday I want to be able to pluck fruit off a tree.��I bet it'd taste yummy if I froze it and turned it into sherbet.

entry.original: I'm so happy I was made to look so cool!
entry.edited: I'm so happy I was made to look so cool!

entry.original: I really admire child actors.��I want to study acting and be on TV someday!
